short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help block bot, spam, and other annoying accounts on Twitter (X).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing the worst tweets known to mankind and wondering how a human could possibly type that? Xout Blocker aims to aid with that problem, allowing you to block usernames based off of commonly found patterns or patterns that you find to often be detestable.
